channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken full bins, 27th June
item.description:
These bins have not been emptied for a while and it could be due to them being broken. The sides of the bin are split. The issue is the rubbish is spilling out and the foxes are getting to it It's becoming a problem Can they be collected and replaced maybe I don't know who's bins they are

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 93 - 109, Knollys Road, West Norwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Oops Graffiti, 27th June
item.description:
Hi there, we have been tagged by Oops out the front of our flats at 53a Lennard Road, please see picture. Is it possible to please get this painted over? Do you happen to know if anyone is closer to finding out who this destructive person is and how close to being caught? Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Lennard Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wood Rubbish Dumped at Wheathill Road, 27th June
item.description:
Huge wooden panels have been dumped on the pavement at Wheathill Road corner Croydon Road, blocking pedestrians and looking awful. This spot is a constant flytipping hotspot, yet nothing changes. It’s time the council took real action to stop this happening every week.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wheathill Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Marestail under pavements outside 7/9 Priory Ave, 27th June
item.description:
Marestail has been under our pavements outside for 30/40 yrs and is coming down to our gardens as it is untreated. I reported this on 27th May and Council has marked it as "resolved " but it is not resolved. Marestail is an aggressive weed with a 2 metre root snd the only way to get rid of it is to lift pavements and pull the whole root out.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Priory Avenue, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 27th June
item.description:
Vehicle has been on road for over 4 weeks. Van was broken in to last week. Vehicle is also untaxed. Children have been going in to vehicles and smoking. I have also written to local MP to complain about vehicle

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gilbert Road, Lower Belvedere, London

item.title: Footpath blocked, 27th June
item.description:
Homeless person returning again. Now of a business can be fined for leaving barrels on the park for 10 minutes this lady needs removing and charging. She’s unsafe, spends all day watching films on her phone and this is a matter that needs urgent attention Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97 - 99, Streatham High Road, Streatham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin full of rubbish, 27th June
item.description:
Can you please remove this bin under my windows? It has been sitting there for over 3 months full of garbage. Not only is it disgusting but it also attracts animals and insects. The bins do not belong to me but to my neighbor who lives at number 6a. I asked him to remove it but he said he does not use them and that he does not know who puts the garbage in there. So please remove the bins from there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Freelands Grove, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fernhead Road from 107-135 Fernhead Road, needs some signs encouraging dog owners to clean up after their dogs., 27th June
item.description:
Fernhead Road 107-135 needs some signs encouraging dog owners to clean up after their dogs. We are living in the 21st century and yet this is still occurring! Dog owners who refuse to clean up after their dogs should be fined!! Thank you in anticipation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 95, Fernhead Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet
